content.raw:
this particular new API name could be confusing, e.g. when looking at an example usage of this function:

`sensor->Visualize();`

At first glance, it appears to be telling the sensor to visualize its data as opposed to checking if sensor is being visualized. Maybe `IsVisualizationOn` or `IsVisualizationEnabled`?
content.html:
this particular new API name could be confusing, e.g. when looking at an example usage of this function:

sensor->Visualize();

At first glance, it appears to be telling the sensor to visualize its data as opposed to checking if sensor is being visualized. Maybe IsVisualizationOn or IsVisualizationEnabled?
